intents.name: Initial Question
intents.question: What were the events leading up to the failure?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Do you have an SMC alarm showing points disturbed?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question:
Do you understand the series of events leading up to the failure 
      and most importantly which way the points is failing?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Is the points failing Normal to Reverse?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Is the points failing Reverse to Normal?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question:
Stop the print train on CCOT and PG the points using PG1 SW1 [ptmne1]. 

      Have you confirmed point status?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Have you contacted DSIM and APCC to report point failure?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Have you contacted Service Manager, Controller and Signaller to get permission to Swing points via CCOT?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Permission granted use SP command to try clear fault?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Did fault clear using SP command?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Are points failing both N-R and R-N?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Has T.O. arrived on site and investigating point failure?

intents.name: SMC Alarm
intents.question: Have you got the prints?

intents.name: Are the points failing both N and R?
intents.question: Are the points failing both N and R?

intents.name: Suspect Common Wiring is Good
intents.question: Suspect that the common wiring is good (unless there is more than one fault).

intents.name: Test the common o/g WK feed
intents.question: Test the common o/g WK feed. 0v chase back. 50v the fault is outside.

intents.name: Fault Outside Common Wiring
intents.question: The fault is outside.

intents.name: Chase Missing Input
intents.question: Chase the missing input to the affected Intersig.

intents.name: Does Fault Clear with Intersig Changeover?
intents.question: Does the fault clear with an Intersig changeover?

intents.name: Test Wiring Common to Both Intersigs
intents.question: Test wiring that is common to both Intersigs.

intents.name: Flowchart Assumes Points Failing from N to R
intents.question: Flowchart now assumes points are failing from N to R.

intents.name: Has the RLR Latched?
intents.question: Has the RLR latched?

intents.name: Ensure NLR has Unlatched then Test RLR Pick Up
intents.question: Ensure the NLR has unlatched then test the RLR pick up.

intents.name: Which LED is Alight on Incoming WK Surge Suppressors?
intents.question: Which LED is alight on the incoming WK surge suppressors? None or N?

intents.name: Test the o/g WL Feed
intents.question: Test the o/g WL feed. 0v chase back. 100v fault outside.

intents.name: Replace WL MCB, Points Remained N
intents.question: The points have remained N. Replace the WL MCB.

intents.name: Test the o/g RW MCB's
intents.question: Test the o/g RW MCB's. 0v chase back. 100v the fault is outside.

intents.name: The points have not achieved R detection.
intents.question: The points have not achieved R detection.

intents.name: Drop the WL using the o/g WL MCB.
intents.question: Drop the WL using the o/g WL MCB. Does the LED alight on the N WK surge suppressor?

intents.name: Test incoming N WK MCB's
intents.question: Test incoming N WK MCB's. The points have moved from N. Replace the WL MCB. 0v The fault is outside.
